title: Bunny-Hopping Pidcock Avenges ‘Reality Check’ at Ruta del Sol with First European Win of 2025
content:
'I made amends today': Pidcock delivers punchy victory as he squares off against deep field at the five-day Ruta del Sol in southern Spain.

Read the full article at Bunny-Hopping Pidcock Avenges ‘Reality Check’ at Ruta del Sol with First European Win of 2025 on Velo.
author: ahood
